name: YOU DON'T KNOW JACK Vol. 6 The Lost Gold
description: Don’t overlook this lost gem! It’s a tasty morsel of trivia that we found under the couch back in the early 2000s, and now we’re pulling it right back out from under that same, dust-mite filled couch! YOU DON’T KNOW JACK, the trivia game that became a TV show that became a massage therapist (briefly) is hoisting her billowy sails once...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 Processor: 500 MHz processor or faster Memory: 128 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 260 MB available space Sound Card: 16-bit sound card Additional Notes: The game runs at 640x480 max resolution.  Change your Desktop resolution if you want the game to fill the screen.
